crunch (Latest commit 660322d3a611782202202ac00109fbd1a10d7602 - Juni 7, 2018)
	"Advanced DXT texture compression and real-time transcoding library"
- License: "ZLIB license"
- Original online: https://github.com/BinomialLLC/crunch
	- Enhanced version from Unity used: https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/crunch/tree/unity
		- See https://blogs.unity3d.com/2017/12/15/crunch-compression-of-etc-textures/
		- See https://blogs.unity3d.com/2017/11/15/updated-crunch-texture-compression-library/
- Updated to "stb_image" v2.16 downloaded from https://github.com/nothings/stb
